results.title: Metformin and exercise effects on postprandial insulin sensitivity and glucose kinetics in pre-and-diabetic adults.
results.text_hl: Eight @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2D@@@ adults (60+-4 years) with @DISEASE_Overweight @DISEASE_MESH:D050177 @@@overweight@@@/@DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obesity@@@ (32+-4 kg m-2) under chronic @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment (9+-6 years; 1281+-524 mg day-1) underwent four trials; a) taking their habitual @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment (@<m>DISEASE_Neoplasms_Second_Primary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016609 @@@MET@@@), b) substituting during 96 h their @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ medication by placebo (PLAC), c) placebo combined with 50 min bout of high-intensity interval exercise (PLAC+EX), and d) @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ combined with exercise (@<m>DISEASE_Neoplasms_Second_Primary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016609 @@@MET@@@+EX).

citations.NLM: Moreno-Cabañas A, Morales-Palomo F, Álvarez-Jimenez L, Mora-Gonzalez D, Ortega JF, Mora-Rodriguez R PhD. Metformin and exercise effects on postprandial insulin sensitivity and glucose kinetics in pre-and-diabetic adults. Am J Physiol Endocrinol Metab. 2023 Aug 16;():. PMID: 37584610
citations.BibTeX: @article{37584610, title={Metformin and exercise effects on postprandial insulin sensitivity and glucose kinetics in pre-and-diabetic adults.}, author={Moreno-Cabañas A and Morales-Palomo F and Álvarez-Jimenez L and Mora-Gonzalez D and Ortega JF and Mora-Rodriguez R PhD}, journal={Am J Physiol Endocrinol Metab}}

results.title: Metformin Reduces Renal Uptake of Radiotracers and Protects Kidneys from Radiation-Induced Damage.
results.text_hl: The purpose of this study was to investigate whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ could reduce renal uptake of peptidyl @CHEMICAL_Radioisotopes @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011868 @@@radiotracers@@@ and serve as a radioprotective agent for peptide receptor radionuclide therapy (@<m>DISEASE_Neoplasms_Second_Primary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016609 @@@PRRT@@@).

citations.NLM: Xiong C, Yin D, Li J, Huang Q, Ravoori MK, Kundra V, Zhu H, Yang Z, Lu Y, Li C. Metformin Reduces Renal Uptake of Radiotracers and Protects Kidneys from Radiation-Induced Damage. Mol Pharm. 2019 Feb 4;16(2):808-815. PMID: 30608713
citations.BibTeX: @article{30608713, title={Metformin Reduces Renal Uptake of Radiotracers and Protects Kidneys from Radiation-Induced Damage.}, author={Xiong C and Yin D and Li J and Huang Q and Ravoori MK and Kundra V and Zhu H and Yang Z and Lu Y and Li C}, journal={Mol Pharm}, volume={16}, number={2}, pages={808-815}}
